9601.npc_desc: An intern staff member from the General Office's logistics team. Not yet proficient but already capable of handling simple tasks.

9602.npc_desc: An intern staff member from the General Office's logistics team. Not yet proficient but already capable of handling simple tasks.

9603.npc_desc: An AI accountant developed with authorization from the General Office's finance team. Subject to dispatching and monitoring by the Mimir system, it is still in the R&D stage, but its efficiency is acceptable.
